contents.text: Thank you for calling Angaza, the number one sales platform for emerging markets offering solar lighting and clean cookstove solutions.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To learn about our solar lighting systems, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for solar lighting solutions.

navigationGoals: Check cost breakdown and delivery schedule for solar lighting kits.
Get pricing and financing details for solar lighting to power my off-grid cabin
I need the technical specs and pricing for your off-grid solar lighting systems.
I'd like to buy a solar lamp for my home.
Get technical specifications and pricing for Angaza’s solar lighting systems

contents.text: To learn about our clean cookstove solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for clean cookstove solutions.

navigationGoals: Review features and price options for clean cookstove units.
Learn about installation requirements and payment plans for a clean cookstove at my rural home
I’d like the efficiency ratings and cost breakdown for your clean cookstove models.
I want information on purchasing a clean cookstove.
Learn about thermal efficiency and cost of Angaza’s clean cookstove solutions

contents.text: For technical support and billing inquiries, press 2.
For platform integration and API support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our platform integration support team.

navigationGoals: Access developer API docs to integrate the platform with our backend.
Integrate Angaza’s API with my NGO’s logistics software to automate solar lamp distributions
I need guidance on integrating Angaza’s API into our backend infrastructure.
I need help linking my solar lighting system to the Angaza platform.
Request API integration guidance for the Angaza platform

contents.text: For account management and billing support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account and billing support team.

navigationGoals: Clarify an unexpected charge on my invoice and revise my payment method.
Review last month’s invoice and update my payment method on file
I want to update my payment method and reconcile my latest invoice.
I need help understanding my account balance and bill.
Discuss a billing discrepancy and obtain my latest invoice
